name: Byu Testing Center Line Conditions
tagline: Google Chrome extension that displays the BYU Testing Center line conditions as well as finals schedule.  See website for website version.
body:
### Welcome to BYU Testing Center Line
This project was built for BYU students to easily check the line conditions at Brigham Young University's testing center. All you have to do is install this free Google Chrome app by going to [https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/byu-testing-center-line-c/iebcpanhemknjngnemomhddnbgeejofe?hl=en](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/byu-testing-center-line-c/iebcpanhemknjngnemomhddnbgeejofe?hl=en).

Optionally, you may install the app from the source code by downloading it above or by cloning it at Github at [https://github.com/bean5/byu-testing-center-line](https://github.com/bean5/byu-testing-center-line).

If you don't want to install it, you can just go to [http://students.cs.byu.edu/~bean5/byu-testing-center-line.git/](http://students.cs.byu.edu/~bean5/byu-testing-center-line.git/).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Gt some some ideas for the project? Just leave feedback at [https://github.com/bean5/byu-testing-center-line/issues/new](https://github.com/bean5/byu-testing-center-line/issues/new)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
